history.proof: intros P H_dec H_not_not_ex. apply LPO_notforall with (P := P). auto. intros H_not_all_not. qsimpl time: 1. contradiction H_not_not_ex. sfirstorder depth: 3.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall P : nat -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P n \/ ~ P n) -> ~ ~ (exists n : nat, P n) -> exists n : nat, P n

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
LPO_notforall : forall P : nat -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P n \/ ~ P n) -> ~ (forall n : nat, ~ P n) -> exists n : nat, P n
dec_inh_nat_subset_has_unique_least_element : forall P : nat -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P n \/ ~ P n) -> (exists n : nat, P n) -> has_unique_least_element le P
LPO_min : forall P : nat -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P n \/ ~ P n) -> {n : nat | P n /\ (forall i : nat, (i < n)%nat -> ~ P i)} + {forall n : nat, ~ P n}
LPO : forall P : nat -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P n \/ ~ P n) -> {n : nat | P n} + {forall n : nat, ~ P n}
Classical_Pred_Type.all_not_not_ex : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Prop), (forall n : U, ~ P n) -> ~ (exists n : U, P n)
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0%nat -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
between_not_exists : forall (P Q : nat -> Prop) (k l : nat), between P k l -> (forall n : nat, in_int k l n -> P n -> ~ Q n) -> ~ exists_between Q k l
Classical_Pred_Type.not_ex_all_not : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Prop), ~ (exists n : U, P n) -> forall n : U, ~ P n
Classical_Pred_Type.not_ex_not_all : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Prop), ~ (exists n : U, ~ P n) -> forall n : U, P n
ClassicalFacts.Minimization_Property = fun P : nat -> Prop => forall n : nat, P n -> exists m : nat, ClassicalFacts.Minimal P m : (nat -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scope is [function_scope]
between_ind : forall (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) (P0 : nat -> Prop), P0 k -> (forall l : nat, between P k l -> P0 l -> P l -> P0 (S l)) -> forall n : nat, between P k n -> P0 n
ClassicalFacts.excluded_middle_entails_unrestricted_minimization : (forall A : Prop, A \/ ~ A) -> forall P : nat -> Prop, ClassicalFacts.Minimization_Property P
Decidable.not_not : forall P : Prop, Decidable.decidable P -> ~ ~ P -> P
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.MP.Dec.FSetLogicalFacts.test_pull : forall P Q R : Prop, Decidable.decidable P -> Decidable.decidable Q -> ~ True -> ~ False -> ~ ~ P -> (~ (P /\ Q) -> ~ R) -> P /\ Q \/ ~ R -> ~ (P /\ Q) \/ R -> R \/ ~ (P /\ Q) -> ~ R \/ P /\ Q -> (~ P -> R) -> ~ (R -> P) /\ ~ (Q -> R) -> ~ P \/ ~ R -> P /\ ~ R -> ~ R /\ P -> True
ClassicalFacts.Minimal = fun (P : nat -> Prop) (n : nat) => P n /\ (forall k : nat, P k -> (n <= k)%nat) : (nat -> Prop) -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope]
Classical_Prop.classic : forall P : Prop, P \/ ~ P

ssrbool.classicP : forall P : Prop, ssrbool.classically P < -> ~ ~ P
Decidable.decidable = fun P : Prop => P \/ ~ P : Prop -> Prop Argument scope is [type_scope]

inj_neq : forall n m : nat, neq n m -> Zne (Z.of_nat n) (Z.of_nat m)
Inductive between (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) : nat -> Prop := bet_emp : between P k k | bet_S : forall l : nat, between P k l -> P l -> between P k (S l) For between: Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope nat_scope] For bet_emp: Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope] For bet_S: Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope nat_scope _ _]
ClassicalFacts.wp2p1 : forall (or : Prop -> Prop -> Prop) (or_introl : forall A B : Prop, A -> or A B) (or_intror : forall A B : Prop, B -> or A B) (or_elim : forall A B C : Prop, (A -> C) -> (B -> C) -> or A B -> C), (forall (A B C : Prop) (f : A -> C) (g : B -> C) (a : A), f a = or_elim A B C f g (or_introl A B a)) -> (forall (A B : Prop) (P : or A B -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (or_introl A B a)) -> (forall b : B, P (or_intror A B b)) -> forall b : or A B, P b) -> forall (wem : forall A : Prop, or (~ ~ A) (~ A)) (B : Prop) (b1 b2 : B) (A : Hurkens.NoRetr...
ClassicalFacts.wp2p2 : forall (or : Prop -> Prop -> Prop) (or_introl : forall A B : Prop, A -> or A B) (or_intror : forall A B : Prop, B -> or A B) (or_elim : forall A B C : Prop, (A -> C) -> (B -> C) -> or A B -> C), (forall (A B C : Prop) (f : A -> C) (g : B -> C) (b : B), g b = or_elim A B C f g (or_intror A B b)) -> (forall (A B : Prop) (P : or A B -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (or_introl A B a)) -> (forall b : B, P (or_intror A B b)) -> forall b : or A B, P b) ->...-> Hurkens.NoRetractToNegativeProp.El A
INR_IZR_INZ : forall n : nat, INR n = IZR (Z.of_nat n)

```coq
intros P H_dec H_not_not_ex.
apply LPO_notforall with (P := P).
auto.
intros H_not_all_not.
apply Classical_Pred_Type.not_ex_all_not in H_not_all_not.
contradiction H_not_not_ex.
Qed.```
